meanings.definition: The act of braiding or weaving strands of material together.
meanings.sent1: Her intricate plaitings of colorful ribbons impressed everyone at the school fair.
meanings.sent2: The basket was beautifully crafted with delicate plaitings of willow branches.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel got tangled in the plaitings of the garden hose.
meanings.sent4: The plaitings of friendship intertwined their lives in a strong bond.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic plaitings of the dancer's hair added elegance to her performance.

meanings.definition: The result of braiding or weaving strands of material together.
meanings.sent1: The intricate plaitings of the rug created a stunning pattern on the floor.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate plaitings of the friendship bracelet her friend made for her.
meanings.sent3: The cat's playful antics left a mess of plaitings in the yarn basket.
meanings.sent4: The plaitings of the river as it flowed through the valley were mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The plaitings of the fabric gave the dress a unique texture and design.
